column1: Angela
You come across Angela who is limping. She says it's nothing. What should we do?
I think i'll get injured too if you're on the field.Please sit on the bench
Trust me and your teammates.Sit this one out.
Don't push yourself too hard.Get off the field if you don't think you can continue.
Angela
The game ended as a tie, but it seems that the competition between Angela and her opponent isn't over yet.
You better win that fight!
Hey! The match is over!
I've never seen her worked up that much.
Angela
The opponent team is spreading rumors that they lost because your team played dirty. What should we do?
Well, you did get ''dirty'' by falling in the dirt.
We didn't play dirty, right?
They will never learn with an attitude like that.
Angela
You're watching the storm with Angela and you spot Princess Meiran taking a walk while humming.
Is something troubling her? I'm having a bad feeling.
What's wrong with her?
She shines even in the darkest storms! How gorgeous!
Angela
Angela is questioning your promise to make the best team ever. It's time to redeem yourself.
Don't be all negative because there were some mistakes. You're a precious part of this team.
Don't be anxious. Have faith and keep following me.
That's why I need your help.
Angela
Angela seems to be lost. She says she no longer hates the rival team.
I don't see a problem with it as long as it doesn't affect your performance on the field.
I guess that's natural. The matches against them were great.
Is there someone on that team that you like? Go propose!
Angela
A player on the other team says soccer became enjoyable after confronting Angela. What should you say?
Well, Angela does have that kind of charm.
Well, you're as cute as Angela.
I hope you two become good rivals.
Angela
It's a hard match and your team is losing. Talk with Angela and talk about what to do.
We can't give up here. There's still a chance to win this.
I hope they have a "Continue" button around here.
Let's come up with a plan after this match is over.
Angela
The team is having a good run and Angela is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
Let's keep this momentum going!
As long as we're not used as training material...
There's still a lot of obstacles ahead.
Angela
The team will be cleaning up the lodging. What will you have Angela do?
Give her instructions so that she can do her share of the cleaning quickly.
Let her take some of the team members and allow them to clean freely.
Let her clean, but warn her not to cause any trouble.
Angela
During a match, Angela bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. She seems depressed. What should we say to cheer her up?
Wasn't that a glitch?
We have to keep on going.
It's something happened during the match. Don"t be so hard on yourself.
Angela
Latios is chatting with Angela after the match. Let's barge in.
Don't you think about sneaking her out. She's our pretty girl.
Angela was fantastic on the field, right?
I'm looking forward to our next match!
Angela
Baltheon, who was upset when he was asked about his past, suddenly started to feel better when he saw Angela.
I think he felt better of the positive energy you always have around you.
Maybe he got embarrassed for being obsessed with his past?
You saved us all from that awkward moment by tripping on you own foot.
Angela
Angela seems to be lost after having a good match while her fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to her.
They say the fortune telling is inaccurate if you don't pay a sufficient price.
It's just a myth. Forget about it.
Game results aren't that simple to be predicted by fortune-telling.
Angela
Angela came to you after the match, and says she's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
Let's work up a solution.
I'm disappointed, too. Let's start over.
Just please go with that boring strategy.
Angela
Angela is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to her.
It's the consequences of your actions. Accept it.
I feel sorry for you and envy you at the same time.
Use this as a chance to enhance your condition.
Angela
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Angela is starting to get intimidated.
Okay, it's time we take this match seriously.
He's obviously obsessed with soccer.
This is good. We can use this as a chance to break their backline.
Angela
With a serious face, Angela is asking what the true meaning of competition is. Let's give her an answer.
Being together is enough for me
Away that a mere high school student can prevent the universe from falling into chaos?
Well, I'm sure we'll get an answer when we get to the end of this.
Angela
Angela is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
It's surprising to see such advanced technology.
Well, I have no problem with it as long as it functions as a soccer ball.
Do you think we can sell it? I think we could get a good price.
Angela
Angela is suddenly taking interest in who Shootmeister actually is. What should we say?
I heard he's a super agent from Nebrion.
All that I care is that he's an excellent trainer.
I can tell that he's a very diligent person that always tries his best.
Angela
Angela's form has been improving rapidly. She says she can't wait for the next match. What should we say to her?
If you keep it up like that you'd be able to play superbly in any position.
Remember that feeling and use it when things get tough.
Consumed a lot of Swirlies, I see.
Angela
Angela is stressed out saying her opponent has the upper ground on every aspect. What should we do?
You can overcome this like always. Right?
It's not your fault. It's your mistakes that took the opponents off guard.
Let's solve the problems one by one.
Angela
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
The emperor of demons is also enjoying this match!
Has he gone mad?
I guess he's happy this is a good match.
Angela
Angela is angry about the opponent's resilient attack on you. What should we say?
Don't worry about me! Do your job!
Can you peel this guy off of me?
Don't come over here! It's dangerous!
Angela
Angela is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give her an answer.
They're on cooldown.
They support us from the shadows.
Even if they're not on the field with us, we're fighting as one.  Right?
Angela
The members of Siena Celtron are furiously searching the stadium for Kuma.
Kuma alert! Get back to the shelter!
Let's ignore them and get ready for the match.
Let's give them a hand.
Angela
Angela is asking about your thoughts on meeting an extraterrestrial being. Let's give her an answer.
I'm afraid to be honest.
I was always looking forward for that moment.
Stay by my side and make sure I don't make any mistakes, will you?
Angela
Angela is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with her.
Just act like yourself. You're already the ace.
Well, having a good ace skill is a start.
Flawless skills.
Angela
Angela seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
Let's make an armor out of Spirit Stones.
Maybe if you increase your Strength...
Don't be weak.
Angela
Angela seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
The fate of the universe is not that simple to be changed by a soccer ball.
Let's open up a bright future with this ball.
Look out! (Kicks the ball far away)
Angela
Angela's opponent is smiling whenever they confront each other on the field. Angela seems to be nervous. Let's talk to her.
That player is just messing with you.
I think that player likes you.
You're doing fine. Don't play your opponent's game.
Angela
Angela looks nervous because the team will be moving to the planet where the next match will be held by taking a space shuttle without the help of Littre.
Did you prepare your meds in case you get space-sick? Never mind, I'll prepare the meds.
Don't worry. Leave it up to me.
Littre will be fine.
Angela
You find Angela depressed for not playing well during the match. Let's cheer her up.
Don't mind it. It's our fault. We weren't able to make use of your strength.
You did well and I thank you for that.
It's not your fualt that you fell during the match. Don't worry about it!
Angela
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
If this is how they do a memorial in Valhalla, it's natural to understand and accept.
I think it's a nice way to cherish the memories of the lost.
Maybe it was a good thing? I mean they say it's a tragedy, but look at how joyful it is.
Angela
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
Cool! Awesome!
Oh, come on! Where's the transformation scene?!
...Uh...So no soccer?
Angela
Angela plans to continue playing soccer even after the Galaxy League ends. Let's talk with her.
I'm thinking of opening a shop.
We'll see about it after the league.
I don't care what I do after the League as long as I get to continue playing soccer.
Angela
Angela seems to be satisfied with the perfect team work. Let's talk to her.
It's thanks to you! Thanks for listening to my instructions.
I'm starting to see the true strengh in this team.
Perfect! No mistakes made!
Angela
Angela is having trouble with continuing nightmares. Let's talk to her.
I'll sleep by your side tonight.
I see. We must be careful. I'll be watching over you.
It's just a dream. Forget about it.
Angela
You visit Marilyn's house and see Hildegard eating ramen.
Can't you cook ramen by yourself?
Ramen, that's a dangerous food to cook.
Is Marilyn your mother or nanny?
Angela
You come across Angela being lost and wandering around while going back to the lodging. Let's talk to her.
Are you feeling alright?
Don't use that ability on the field.
Don't worry, I'll go with you.
Death Queen
Death Queen has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
You always seem to find the weak point of the opponent's defense and I love that.
Your attacks are so strong the opponents can't handle it. You should keep that going.
I hope you'd stop sharing small talks with your opponents on the field.
Death Queen
Death Queen wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
Perfect planning and perfect execution
All goes as planned....Hmm? Just ignore that.
Why don't you join them and find out?
Death Queen
Ogre's pony tail slapped Death Queen in the face!
Even his hair is a weapon! Is that even allowed?
That must hurt.
Ugh...Gross...
Death Queen
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
That's a sad story. I'm tearing up.
I feel bad for them, but that's no excuse for throwing the game.
It would be rude to them if we don't do our best.
Death Queen
Death Queen lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
This doesn't look good...Can anybody give her some heals?
Well, this could have been prevented if you just consumed those Swirlies like I told you...
I will avenge you!
Death Queen
Lynia is cleaning the streets with the members of Jeneva Crew. Death Queen is curious and wants to take a look.
We should probably ignore them and just walk by.
Let's go help them!
They must love volunteer work!
Death Queen
Death Queen is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
I hope this won't affect your performance on the field.
The fans love your performance!
Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.
Death Queen
Death Queen scored a hat trick and led the team to a complete victory! Congratulate her!
Hmm? Didn't we win the game when we scored the first goal?
That was awesome! I'm looking forward to seeing more of that!
You're starting to show the world your true potential! I'm impressed!
Death Queen
Death Queen is asking who you think of first when you win a match. Let's answer.
My teammates and their flawless play!
My friends from previous life... They would be pleased to see me win.
My fans!
Death Queen
Death Queen says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
Hmm, a revived person that forgot his purpose...Reminds me of somebody.
He'll remember someday.
That's bad. I'm sure it's something important!
Death Queen
Death Queen brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
The drink looks really scary...But we can't just throw it away...
Throw it away. NOW.
Drink it up!
Death Queen
Death Queen says that the Swirlies are missing.
They were sacrificed as material for a greater cause.
They have wings so I'm sure they flew away.
I evolved them.
Death Queen
Death Queen seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
The eye patch...I wonder if she washes it. She seems to have it on all times.
That's dangerous secret you're trying to find out about. Do you still want to know?
Death Queen
A player on the other side is on the field with his arms tied up. Let's talk about this with Death Queen.
I feel like he's mocking us!
It hurts when the whip first crackles. And the pain just keeps ramping up.
He still has his two legs functioning. I see no problem with that.
Death Queen
The team made it up to the semi-finals after counting the goal differences. Death Queen asks how you feel. How should we answer?
What, are you expecting something like "I feel like i can fly" or something?
This is where things get serious. We're going for the win!
Wow. I'm sooooo happy.
Death Queen
The crowd is cheering for Death Queen. Death Queen seems to find this situation new and a bit uncomfortable. Let's help her out.
They're all in love with your enthusiastic plays.
They know you gave everything you got. It was spectacular.
How about just acceping the compliments for today?
Death Queen
Death Queen is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
It's all because nobody on this team cares about strategy! This is nonsense!
We haven't awakened our TRUE powers! We have to go further beyond!
Death Queen
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
Well, now what?
Come back Huginn! Wait, is it Muninn?
A crow?!
Death Queen
You're walking in a narrow ally and come across Death Queen having an intense staring contest with the captain of the opposing team. What should we say?
Save the energy for the match.
How about solving this with a game of rock, scissors, paper?
...I see two idiots standing in front of me...
Death Queen
Death Queen suggests that we have a team dinner to lighten things up. What will be your reaction?
How about a salad? I'm on a diet.
How could you think about eating in a time like this? I'm dissapointed in you.
Good idea. Let's go get some meat!
Death Queen
Death Queen is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
(Put your thumbs up, ink, and send a juicy smile.)
(Pat her on the head.)
(Just nod your head.)
Death Queen
As Death Queen said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
I'm sure it's going in a good direction.
I feel like the universe is heading towards chaos.
It's not the Galaxy League. We are the ones that are leading the fate of this universe.
Death Queen
Death Queen is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
This is your chance to buy the hottest fashion items in space!
Gate Keeper dolls!Why not!
How about some presents for your parents?
Death Queen
Death Queen falls to the ground after clashing with the opponent. What should we say to her?
If that's all you've got, just stay down. It's okay.
Get up! The game's not over! You better not give up!
Well, let's start by dropping that player's HP to 1.
Death Queen
Death Queen is curious about the Galaxy League. What answer will help her?
It's the place where the chosen ones learn about their destiny.
It's the place of dreams colliding.
It's stressful because we can't prepare for extraterrestrial sanitation. We're completely exposed to all those unknown...things
Death Queen
You come across Sammy while walking the street with Death Queen. Let's talk to her.
We'll win next time!
Do you also do fortune telling? I think I'm in love.
(Ignore.)
Death Queen
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Ugh...I want to dig my eyes out.
Fontus...You sure are my archnemesis!
Death Queen
It's a throwing chance, but the opponent team player suddenly jumps in joy saying his baby brother is born. What should you do?
I could throw the ball and continue the match, but my honor wouldn't allow that.
I guess I finally get to meet my archnemesis.
Wow, congratulations! (Claps)
Death Queen
Death Queen is suddenly showing massive improvement in her performance. She must've learned something during a match.
Impressive! You're the ace of this team now!
You've become better. Now you need to focus on staying that way.
I knew this day would come.
Death Queen
It's a very intense match and Death Queen falls on the ground, but a player on the other team helps Death Queen up and the two exchange smiles.
Guess the match isn't that tough for you, huh?
True sportsmanship! Wonderful!
That player must have a heart of gold.
Death Queen
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
I can't stand this...I need to end this quickly and go take a shower.
What a depressing weather...
Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Elise
Elise seems to be upset about losing a body check against her opponent.
Let's make an armor out of Spirit Stones.
Maybe if you increase your Strength...
Don't be weak.
Jiho
Jiho is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to her?
That doesn't change what we must do.
Come on, cheer up. You're not being yourself.
Stop whining. I like it better when you're arrogant and sarcastic.
Jiho
Jiho is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
He's just material for leveling up.
I like how all of the Gate Keepers have different characteristics.
That bear...Is a hero...!
Jiho
Jiho came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
What happened to you? Do you want me to lend you some money?
I'm sure you got scammed.
I hope that wasn't all you got.
Jiho
It seems that Jiho is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
Listen carefully and you'll find her.
Let's ask Khirel to find her...
Jiho? Nah, she never get lost.
Jiho
Jiho is worried that she has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell her?
Look at the beautiful players! This is paradise!
You're the most dangerous of them all.
Makes it worth the challenge, don't you think so?
Jiho
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Jiho on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
You and I are already perfect. So I guess that means we wouldn't be saying our names.
I can't pick just one...
I think it should be you, but will you be able to return to your normal life after all of this...Wait, I'm going off topic, right?
Jiho
Jiho is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to her.
I want you to form a team and catch every single bear near this locker room.
...If you want to say something,it's alright. I'll be listening.
Let's go tell the manager.
Jiho
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
...We should get out of here.
...It's about to go down...! Where's the popcorn?
James and Bora...Who's the villain?
Jiho
Jiho says she wants to cry because the goal keeper on the other team just won't go down no matter how many shots she makes.
Let's start by picking their defenses apart.
Let's come up with a new strategy to giove you more synergy.
I'll come up with a formation that can bring the best out of everybody.
Jiho
Jiho is getting slow on the field and this is causing trouble. Let's talk with Jiho.
I think we should come up with an action speed deck or go for counterattacks...
I'll try to have the ball come your way.
We can overcome this with team effort.
Jiho
The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?
Manga, anime, and figures...! Here I come!
It's time for some good food.
I guess I can go to the soccer gear shop.
Jiho
Jiho looks startled after learning the underworld actually exists.
It's space. Anything can exist here.
How about we ask Jeunese?
Sounds like a more boring place than Cruzentes.
Jiho
Jiho, who is determined to make everything in her life, even her dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
It was an intense feeling as if I was going against the strongest team in the universe.
I've never dreamt about soccer.
I've been chased by a soccer ball monster in my dreams. It was terrifying.
Jiho
You find Jiho lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
Stop wandering around the kids snack corner!
Hmm, I guess you're more domestic than I thought.
Jiho
Jiho announces that she will become an influential player that changes the league completely. Let's give her an answer.
You'll have to compete with me!
I feel bad for the players that have to face you.
I have faith in you.
Jiho
Jiho is telling a story about how an old kingdom in Valhalla was doomed because of the king.
I'm sure there were mutliple reasons on why the kingdom fell. It's sad to hear such stories.
So, is that king entering Galaxy League?
Pathetic..That is no king.
Jiho
Jiho wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
That seems like a dangerous idea... Let's not make any quick decisions.
What about just watching?
Sure. Let's beat them all and take the prize money!
Jiho
Jiho is having trouble focusing on the match. Let's help her out.
I'll teach you how to meditate to synchronize the breathing with other teammates.
It's impossible to focus on a field with so many handsome men.
Just calm down a bit. You got this.
Jiho
Jiho is sad that the World Tree in Umbra has withered. What could we say to cheer her up?
We'll find the ones that did this and use them as fertilizers.
It's a big tree. It'll stand strong.
Jiho
Jiho
Something must have startled Beelzebub. He has entered the field and is making a scene.
It's time we use him as training material.
Stop right there, pig!
Team! We're having sauteed shredded pork for tonight!
Jiho
Jiho wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. She wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to her.
I'm surprised you care so much for your friends.
Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It'll be pretty exciting if we could stay the same even after 10 years.
Jiho
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
I'll tackle him down! Knock his lights out!
Don't kill him, okay?
We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
Jiho
It's Jiho's birthday. Let's give her a present.
Here! I made some cookies with the team.
I stole this treasure box from Kuma.
This is a championship trophy replica for you. The designs are inspired by you.
Jiho
You see Jiho's opponent trash talking and smirking towards Jiho. What should we do?
She is probably not even listening.
Let's see how long they last. Come on guys!
Tell me if you like her. Just say the words and i'll scout her.
Jiho
Jiho doesn't like the new team advertisement video.
There's not enough fan service.
It didn't portray your awesome performance.
It didn't have to have the bench warmers in the video.
Jiho
You find Jiho being very excited after performing an awesome play. How will you react?
Can't you do that more often?! (Cries)
Nice play! Fantastic!
Now we're starting to look like a team!
Jiho
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Jiho seems to be sick of this.
Okay! Now I'll tell you all the good stuff about Jiho!
Iron Claw!
Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Jiho
You got a couple of tickets to Veronica's live concert. Jiho seems to be interested.
These are for you, of course. Here.
We're going to make it fair and gather everybody around so we can draw for the ticket.
I'll give you this, so get rid of that fake ticket.
Jiho
Jiho says she doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. She thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
I think you two have something in common...
Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
Hmm? That is odd... What do you think about this?
Jiho
With a serious look on her face, Jiho warns you to go to the bathroom before the match.
Bathroom... It is indeed a very important matter...
Why does an ordinary advice sound so strange..
I'm surprised you said that. I won't ask what happened to you.
Jiho
Jiho is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
It's all thanks to you.
It's a result of team effort.
The opponents are mesmarized by the beauty of our players.
Kevin
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Kevin seems to be sick of this.
Okay! Now I'll tell you all the good stuff about Kevin!
Iron Claw!
Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Kevin
Kevin is furious about how Lucian is always surrounded by girls. What should we say?
Are you jealous?
He's popular, just not as much as me.
He's good looking and has a good personality. Maybe that's why.
Kevin
It's a tough match, but Kevin is standing tall and encouraging the team. What should we say to him?
You really help us a lot in these situations.
You're a good person.
Your spirit is an inspiration to us all.
Kevin
Kevin looks sad because he feels his friendship with a friend in a rival team is falling apart. What should we say to him?
It's not your fault. Let's try to find out why this is happening.
Try starting off with some small talk.
If your friend is truly your friend, he will understand.
Kevin
The team is at Metro City. Kevin seems to be surprised how the people of Metro City have mechanical bodies.
I like how they don't mind physical flaws.
I like how even the minority can be saved in this society.
You have a heart of gold.
Kevin
Kevin refuses to listen to anybody's advice saying he's the best and he doesn't need any advice. Let's talk to him.
Are you angry because I wasn't there to oversee your training? I said I'm sorry!
Well that's absolutely fine if you can actually prove that you're the best.
That's not like you...
Kevin
Kevin seems to be uncomfortable to hear about the love life of other teammates. Let's talk to him.
It's all good as long as it doesn't affect the match.
Should we join the club?
Just say it. You're jealous.
Kevin
Kevin is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
That doesn't change what we must do.
Come on, cheer up. You're not being yourself.
Stop whining. I like it better when you're arrogant and sarcastic.
Kevin
Kevin, who is determined to make everything in his life, even his dreams, about soccer, asks you what it's like to dream about soccer. Let's think about it.
It was an intense feeling as if i was going against the strongest team in the universe.
I've never dreamt about soccer.
I've been chased by a soccer ball monster in my dreams. it was terrifying
Kevin
The team seems very nervous facing Skalardra. What should we do?
Hmm? What's wrong everybody?
Political power means nothing on the field.
Huh? I think Kevin is prettier.
Kevin
Kirin suddenly appears, pats Kevin on the head while teasing him, and then goes away. Kevin seems angry...
He's like the wind. There wasn't even time to chat.
...I think you liked it more than you thought...
Patting you on the head? He must not fear for his life!
Kevin
Kevin wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
I'm surprised you care so much for your friends.
Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It'll be pretty exciting if we could stay the same even after 10 years.
Kevin
Kevin wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
What about just watching?
Sure. Let's beat them all and take the prize money!
Kevin
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
...We should get out of here.
...It's about to go down...! Where's the popcorn?
James and Bora...Who's the villain?
Kevin
Kevin is asking you what you think is it that makes this team great. You weren't expecting this, but you should give him an answer.
We have a strong lineup of players that make our star players shine brighter.
Well, you're looking at the one person that is making this team great.
You. I know you're doing much for the team without taking any credit.

Let's see what you have to say after the match.
I didn't know I was a talented foot volleyball player!
Care to receive the ball with your face?
Nerua
Nerua has shown outstanding performance on both the offensive and defensive side. She is asking for your evaluation on her plays. Let's give her an answer.
You always seem to find the weak point of the opponent's defense and I love that.
Your attacks are so strong the opponent can't handle it. You should keep that going.
I hope you're sharing small talks with your opponents on the field.
Nerua
Nerua is saying that her teammates are what keeps her going.
(Put your thumbs up, win, and send a jucy smile.)
(Pat her on the head.)
(Just nod your head.)
Nerua
Nari is dancing and singing a song about the galaxy.
The stage is so majestic! It's awesome!
This proves that even the aliens like Nari.
I think she's something more than just an idol.
Nerua
Nerua is looking excited and asks how the match went.
The other team went home crying!
They were a worthy opponent.
I led our team to victory with wedgies!
Nerua
Nerua wonders why Castor twitches whenever he sees Beatrice.
Long ago, he was disgraceful towards a dragon emissary.
The character story left him a trauma.
Maybe he just wants to duke it out.
Nerua
Nerua isn't pleased with the team's recent plays. She feels that the plays have become somewhat repetitive and dull.
Let's all talk together and figure out what the problem is.
Let's invest some crystals and get new players!
We may have to go rough on the team and make them realize the problem.
Nerua
MX54 Butcher is closing in on a cat with a suspicious smile.
Stop right there!
Excuse me, but do you have an appointment with that cat?
...Maybe he just likes cats!
Nerua
With back to back matches, the team is exhausted. Let's talk to Nerua for solutions.
We won't be able to win the league if we fail to overcome this.
I guess it's time the benchwarmers get a chance.
How about we put that advanced technology of Metro City to use?
Nerua
The next opponent is the Lab Rat Entry. You hear that all of the players on the other team are victims of experiments and this makes you feel uncomfortable.
That's a sad story. I'm tearing up.
I feel bad for them, but that's no excuse for throwing the game.
It would be rude to them if we don't do our best.
Nerua
This was the worst game in your entire life...Nerua comes to you to cheer you up.
Please explain why you kicked the ball into our goal post, will you?
Thanks...I know you're the one that's the most devastated...Let's do better next time.
Thanks. You always know how to get me back on my feet.
Nerua
Nerua is impressed by the help she received from the elementals. Let's talk to her.
The only problem is that they take up a lot of space in the inventory.
I feel like whole universe is cheering for us when we're with the elementals!
I am so thankful to then.
Nerua
As Nerua said, the universe is facing a new course of destiny because of the Galaxy League. Let's talk to her.
I'm sure it's going in a good direction.
I feel like the universe is heading towards chaos.
It's not the Galaxy League. We are the ones that are leading the fate of this universe.
Nerua
Nerua is worried about all of the powerful beings that will be competing in the Galaxy League. Let's say something to her.
It's only a sport! The strongest team wins, and we are strong!
I'm sure everybody's feeling the same way you feel.
Aren't you the one everybody should be afraid of?
Nerua
The team manger ran away with all of the team's money. What should we do?
We could start a reset marathon.
We're going to hunt that manager down and take back our money. We will show no mercy!
Let's ask for help to the League officials on this planet.
Nerua
Nerua suggests that we visit the Celestial Castle, which is a place that the baby angels live.
What's the agenda here? Are you trying to taint the pure angels?
This is a good chance to show the baby angels how rough soccer can be!
That would be wonderful! I'll go ask for permission.
Nerua
You're sick and in bed when Nerua and the teammates come to cheer you up. What will your response be?
You guys... I'm about to cry...
I'm sorry... I should be giving you guys some tea or something, but...
Get closer so I can spread my germs!
Nerua
Nerua is surrounded by fans and seems to be overwhelmed. Let's talk to her.
I hope this won't affect your performance on the field.
The fans love your performance!
Should've practiced that autograph like I told you.
Nerua
Nerua brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
The drink looks really scary...But we can't just throw it away...
Throw it away. NOW.
Drink it up!
Veronica
Veronica is making a scene about the women's uniform and underwear disappearing. Let's talk to her.
I want you to form a team and catch every single bear near this locker room.
...If you want to say something, it's alright. I'll be listening.
Let's go tell the manager.
Veronica
Ogre's pony tail slapped Veronica in the face!
Even his hair is a weapon! Is that allowed?
That must hurt.
Ugh...Gross...
Veronica
It's Veronica's birthday. Let's give her a present.
Here! I made some cookies with the team.
I stole this treasure box from Kuma.
This is a championship trophy replica for you. The designs are inspired by you.
Veronica
Veronica is worried about the team's poor performance. Let's go talk to her.
Everybody is not at 100%. But, I think we'll do better sooner or later.
It's all because nobody on this team cares about strategy! This is nonsense!
We haven't awakend our TRUE powers! We have to go further beyond!
Veronica
Veronica comes to you and says that she has to leave the team because of personal reasons. What should we say?
Well, I don't want to be the one holding you back. Good Luck!
There will always be a place for you to return.
So, how does this work? Do I tap "Sell"?
Veronica
Veronica says she forgot to use her skill points before entering the match. What should we say to her?
That's unacceptable!
You can only find your true potential when you don't rely on your skills!
Well, we can't do anything about that right now. Let's focus more on passing the ball.
Veronica
Preparing for the press conference, you're talking with Veronica on which player you think has the brightest future. What will you say?
You and I are already perfect. So I guess that means we shouldn't be saying our names.
I can't just pick one...
I think it should be you, but will you be able to return to your normal life after all of this...Wait, I'm going off topic, right?
Veronica
The team is going to go shop. Which group will you join?
Manga, anime, and figures...! Here I come!
It's time for some good food.
I guess I can go to the soccer gear shop.
Veronica
Veronica seems to be curious about Bora's covered eye. What should we answer?
I don't know much about her, but she looks strong.
The eyepatch...I wonder if she washes it. She seems to have it on all the times.
That's a dangerous secret you're trying to find out about. Do you still want to know?
Veronica
The rain has messed up the field and the enemy team seems to be determined to crush your team.
I can't stand this...I need to end this quickly and go take a shower.
What a depressing weather...
Well, if it's a muddy dog fight they want, let's give it to them!
Veronica
You got a couple of tickets to Veronica's live concert. Veronica seems to be interested.
These are for you, of course. Here.
We're going to make it fair and gather everybody around so we can draw for the ticket.
I'll give you this, so get rid of that fake ticket.
Veronica
Sorrow suddenly flies off after seeing a shiny object in the sky.
Well, now what?
Come back Huginn! Wait, is it Muninn?
A crow?!
Veronica
Veronica is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
He's just material for leveling up.
I like how all of the Gate Keepers have different characteristics.
That bear...Is a hero...!
Veronica
Veronica is telling a story about how an old kingdom in Valhalla was doomed because of the king.
I'm sure there were multiple reasons on why the kingdom fell. It's sad to hear such stories.
So, is that king entering the Galaxy League?
Pathetic... That is no king.
Veronica
Veronica is asking what to buy in the souvenir shop. Let's give her an opinion.
This is your chance to buy the hottest fashion items in space!
Gate Keeper dolls! Why not!
How about some presents for your parents?
Veronica
Veronica says that Hiro, a member of the Einherjar, doesn't remember why he was revived.
Hmm, a revivded person that forgot his purpose... Reminds me of somebody.
He'll remember someday.
That's bad. I'm sure it's something important!
Veronica
Veronica doesn't like the new team advertisement video.
There's not enough fan service.
It didn't portray your awesome performance.
It didn't have to have the bench warmers in the video.
Veronica
This match will be held on Earth. We still have some time. What do you want to do?
Well, I could show you around and introduce you to the things on Earth.
I heard that the bath products on Earth are the best in the universe.
I'm going to check out the new comic issues. Wanna come along?
Veronica
Veronica is wondering why the team is doing so well recently. Pick an answer.
It's all thanks to you.
It's a result of team effort.
The opponents are mesmerized by the beauty of our players.
Veronica
Veronica is irritated because her opponent has the attribute advantage over her.
It's not even a rainbow swirly match. Let's just play for now.
Do I have to stop the match?
It's time, Veronica! Awaken the 6th attribute and show your true powers!
Veronica
Veronica is being sentimental about how soccer, which was supposed to be a one time thing, became her life. Let's talk with her.
Yeah. I understand you. Soccer is so much fun!
Life, eh? I guess that's a bit too serious for me, but I think I understand how you feel.
And that's how we walk towards our destiny.
Veronica
Veronica is asking if you have a special person who you would like to share happy moments with. Let's give her an answer.
I think that may be you.
Every teammate there by my side on the field is special.
My Nari dakimakura! She's the best idol in the universe and is super strong.
Veronica
Veronica is worried that she has to face demons, black holes and other dangerous things. What should we tell her?
Look at the beautiful players! This is paradise!
You're the most dangerous of them all.
Makes it worth the challenge, don't you think so?
Veronica
Veronica wants to hear about your plans on training the new players. What should we answer?
Perfect planning and perfect execution
All goes as planned...hmm? Just ignore that.
Why don't you join them and find out?

I don't think you need to worry about a diet.
You're playing soccer! You're fine!
Please don't forget about the match.

Jury

Jury
You witness Fontus, the most violent and powerful creature in the universe, flying the night sky in a Santa costume.
...The stress has finally got to him. It must be that...
Ugh...I want to dig my eyes out.
Fontus...You sure are my archnemesis!
Leventor
You come across an opponent player limping, because of getting injured during a match against your team. Leventor seems to be worried.
Weakling. Should've been rougher on that player.
It's unfortunate, but that happened during a match and it's not our fault.
Let's just go. That player will also feel uncomfortable if we keep standing here.
Leventor
A teammate is being stubborn about going out on the field while having a very severe fever. What should we do?
I'll tackle him down! Knock his lights out!
Don't kill him, okay?
We're taking him to the doctor even if that means by force. Help me.
Leventor
Leventor is depressed thinking that winning the Galaxy League is a goal that can't be achieved. What should we say to him?
That doesn't change what we must do.
Come on, cheer up. You're not being yourself.
Stop whining. I like it better when you're arrogant and sarcastic.
Leventor
Leventor is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.
It's surprising to see such advanced technology.
Well, I have no problem with it as long as it functions as a soccer ball.
Do you think we can sell it? I think we could get a good price.
Leventor
Leventor came to you after the match, and says he's disappointed at the team's boring strategy. What should we say?
Let's work up a solution.
I'm disappointed, too. Let's start over.
Just please go with that boring strategy.
Leventor
The team is having a good run and Leventor is sure that winning the League is a matter of time.
Let's keep this momentum going!
As long as we're not used as training material...
There's still a lot of obstacles ahead.
Leventor
You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
Cool! Awesome!
Oh, come on! Where's the transformation scene?!
...Uh...So no soccer?
Leventor
Leventor came back without a penny after marching into the Casino.
What happened to you? Do you want me to lend you some money?
I'm sure you got scammed.
I hope that wasn't all you got.
Leventor
Leventor seems to be lost after having a good match while his fortune-telling said things would go wrong. Let's talk to him.
They say fortune-telling inaccurate if you don't pay a sufficient price.
It's just a mayth. Forget about it.
Game result aren't that simple to be predicted by fortune-telling.
Leventor
Your team is playing against the Scout Entries and Malcolm seems to be enjoying himself a little too much. Leventor is starting to get intimidated.
Okay, it's time we take this match seriously.
He's obviously obsessed with soccer.
This is good. We can use this as a chance to break their back line.
Leventor
You find Leventor lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?
Stop wandering around the kids snack corner!
Hmm, I guess you're more domestic than I thought.
Leventor
Leventor wants the team to enter the Underground League on Earth. What should we do?
That seems like a dangerous idea...Let's not make any quick decisions.
What about just watching?
Sure. Let's beat them all and take the prize money.
Leventor
Leventor wants to cherish every precious meeting with other people and beings. He wants to be good friends with everybody. Let's talk to him.
I'm surprised you care so much for your friends.
Nothing is eternal, but that doesn't make it insignificant.
It'll be pretty exciting if we could stay the same even after 10 years.
Leventor
Leventor is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give him an answer.
They're on cooldown.
They support us from the shadows.
Even if they're not on the field with us, we're fighting as one. Right?
Leventor
Leventor is asking what the conditions of a team ace are with a serious face. Let's talk with him.
Just act like yourself. You're already the ace.
Well, having a good ace skill is a start.
Flawless skills.
Leventor
The middle fielder on the other team is too powerful. Let's give Leventor some orders.
Pass? Shoot? Forfeit? Argh! Just make a run for it!
Make him know who he's up against
Let's try out some forward passes.
Leventor
Leventor is asking about what's the most important condition in winning today's match. Let's give him an answer.
We need a decent level of personal performance.
What could it be? Money? Luck? Weather? Hmm? What?
Wreck the other team.
Leventor
Leventor seems to be upset about losing a body check against his opponent.
Let's make armor out of spirit stones.
Maybe if you increase your Strength...
Don't be weak.
Leventor
During a match, Leventor bumped into a teammate and knocked the player out. He seems depressed. What should we say to cheer him up?
Wasn't that a glitch?
We have to keep on going.
It's something that happened during the match. Don't be so hard on yourself.
Leventor
James is fighting Akane after ambushing Yuri, and Bora is slowly making her approach from a distance.
...We should get out of here.
...It's about to go down...! Where's the popcorn?
James and Bora...Who's the villain?
Leventor
Vitos suddenly laughs in joy during the match against the Empire. Why?
The emperor of demons is also enjoying this match!
Has he gone mad?
I guess he's happy this is a good match.
Leventor
The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Leventor to set some simple rules.
This team is a mess. Gather everybody on the field. I'll knock that spirit back into you guys if I have to.
Let's split up and meet back here for dinner. Tell everybody to enjoy their free time.
Come on, I'll show you the best spots around!
Leventor
Mimi continues to praise Princess Meiran and it's likely that this isn't going to end any time soon. Leventor seems to be sick of this.
Okay! Now I'll tell you all the good stuff about Leventor!
Iron Claw!
Oh, there's Princess Meiran! (Runs away)
Leventor
Leventor seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.
The fate of the universe is not that simple to be changed by a soccer ball.
Let's open up a bright future with this ball.
Look out! (Kicks the ball far away)
Leventor
Leventor caught a player on the other team spying on your team's practice. What should we do?
I think we should hang him.
Why don't we take this opportunity to see how our opponents are practicing.
You came to see my marvelous moves? I'm flattered.
Leventor
Leventor seems to be lost. He says he no longer hates the rival team.
I don't see a problem with that as long as it doesn't affect your performance on the field.
I guess that's natural. The matches against them were great.
Is there someone on that team that you like? Go propose!
Leventor
Leventor says he doesn't understand why other angels are afraid of Uriel. He thinks Uriel is a very kind angel.
I think you two have something common...
Maybe that's just because she's the leader of that group.
Hmm? That is odd... What do you think about this?
Leventor
It seems that Leventor is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
Listen carefully and you'll find him.
Let's ask Khirel to find him...
Leventor? Nah, he never gets lost.
Leventor
You're at the Yggdrasil memorial ceremony. The Yggdrasil Guardians are parading through the festive crowd.
If this is how they do a memorial in Valhalla, it's natural to understand and accept.
I think it's a nice way to cherish the memories of the lost.
Maybe it was a good thing? I mean they say it's a tragedy, but look at how joyful it is.
Leventor
Leventor is complaining about restricted from playing the next match for receiving too many fouls. Let's talk to him.
It's the consequences of your actions. Accept it.
I feel sorry for you and envy you at the same time.
Use this as a chance to enhance your condition.
Leventor

It was an intense feeling as if I was going against the strongest team in the universe.
I've never dreamt about soccer.
I've been chased by a soccer ball monster in my dreams. It was terrifying.
Leventor

I'm thinking of opening a shop.

I don't care what I do after the League as long as I get to continue playing soccer.

Black Tortoise
Black Tortoise is surprised of how sturdy the ball is, as it withstands the strength of angels, demons, and even beings of unknown worlds.

Black Tortoise

Black Tortoise

Black Tortoise

Black Tortoise

Black Tortoise seems to be very confused of how a small soccer ball can change the fate of the universe.

Duke
Duke is having trouble deciding a name for his special move. His options are ''Infinity Illusion Shot'', ''11th Dimension Ultra Gravity Shot'', ''Astral Space Shot'', and a few more.

Dale is complaining that it's boring to play only soccer every day. What should we say to him?

Dale lost to the opponent and fell to the ground. What should we do?
This doesn't look good... Can anybody give him some heals?

I will avenge you!
Dale
Dale is mesmerized by the majestic scenery of a dragon flying in the skies of the Iron Canyon.
I want one of those. It'll be fun to have a pet dragon.
I can feel the strength of that majestic creature.
Hmm... If only I could change the shape of the horns and the color of the scales. That'd be perfect.
Gerrard
Gerrard is questioning Kuma's status as a Gate Keeper.
He's just material for leveing up.

Gerrard
Gerrard brought a drink that she says received from the coach on the other team. It looks very suspicious especially with the dark fumes coming out of it.
The drink looks really scary...But we can't just throw it away...
Throw it away. NOW.
Drink it up!

The team is in a slump and you take the team out for refreshment. Talk with Jheet to set some simple rules.

You were enjoying the peaceful day on Earth until the Peacemakers suddenly showed up. At that moment, the Magical Girl Elements came to save the day!
Cool! Awesome!

Oh, there's Princess Merian! (Runs away)

Jheet is curious of the whereabouts of the managers that are nowhere to be seen during the match. Let's give him an answer.

You find Jheet lurking around the food corner at the shopping center. What should we say?
Hello! Have you come here to buy food for dinner?

Hmmm, I guess you're more domestic than I thought.

It seems that Jheet is lost in the Nadir forest. What should we do?
Listen carefully and you'll find him.

Baltheon? Nah, he never gets lost.
